ConversationContextEntry.name: ConversationContextEntry
ConversationContextEntry.description: Represents the context of a message or an event in the chat history between an agent and a messaging user.

ConversationContextEntryName.description: The autogenerated number of the entry.

CustomDetailContextKey.description: The key or name of the pre-chat field specified by the admin in the pre-chat implementation, for example, customer_email.

CustomDetailContextValue.description: The value entered in the pre-chat field by a user before starting the chat.

ParentId.description: The Conversation ID this entry is associated with.
